title: Sword Master Online - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy World   Game Elements   Loli   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Sword And Magic   Transported into a Game World
author: 凌石更
description:
The virtual reality DMMORPG had turned into a death-game, and after the final battle, Mu thought it all had finally ended, but upon waking up, he found out that he, along with current stats and abilities, was transported to another [new game]......
>
